name: Bulls & Cows (Alex Graham)
description:
First game I made as part of my online Unreal course. A simple word guessing game with a cute backdrop to go along with it.

As the first module in my online course this game covered the basics of navigating and manipulating the Unreal workspace and the basics of coding in the Unreal engine using C++. Overall we covered editing landscapes, adding actors, constant functions, TArrays and loading predicates.

How To Play

Instructions are displayed when you launch the game.
